creator: anathaniel@apache.org
text:
The "file" attribute for the <fixcrlf> task is an ant-1.7 feature.

It should be noted in the README that ant-1.7+ is required, or the fixcrlf parameters should be changed to conform to ant-1.6 syntax.

Requirement for Ant 1.7 noted on the "compiling" page. The README file already points to this page. Thanks for the hint!
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=668533&view=rev
(the change will be propagated to trunk and the website soon)
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
